price: Sen, onları hasret günü ile korkut. İş hükmedilip bitirilmiştir. Onlar (dünyada bu hususta) gaflet içindedirler ve onlar iman etmezler
arabic: وَأَنذِرۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡحَسۡرَةِ إِذۡ قُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-andhir'hum yawma al-ḥasrati idh quḍiya al-amru wahum fī ghaflatin wahum lā yu'minūna
